text: De Nobili School, Mugma is a Jesuit school in [Jharkhand , India. It has grades one through twelve and prepares students for the Indian Certificate of Secondary Education (ICSE) examination in class 10 and for the Indian School Certificate (ISC) in class 12. It was opened in 1977, and teaching is in English. ==References== Category:Jesuit secondary schools Category:Jesuit schools in India Category:Catholic secondary schools in India Category:Christian schools in Jharkhand Category:High schools and secondary schools in Jharkhand Category:Education in Dhanbad district Category:Educational institutions established in 1977 Category:1977 establishments in India
title: De Nobili School, Mugma
